authorizeContractCaller(address).details: Authorize contract address to be a caller for the data contract    * Only contract addresses stored in the mapping variable are able to call the data contract

constructor.details: Constructor     The deploying account becomes contractOwner

creditInsurees(address,bytes32,uint8).details: Credits payouts to insurees      The insurance state is updated in this function in order to credit the payouts to insuree

deauthorizeContractCaller(address).details: Deauthorize contract address to be a caller for the data contract    * Only contract addresses stored in the mapping variable are able to call the data contract

fetchActiveInsurancesKeysByPassenger(add.details: Fetch array of registered insurances by passenger key

fetchAirlineByAddress(address).details: Fetch airline data     Can only be called from FlightSuretyApp contract

fetchDataContractConfiguration().details: Fetch configuration data of the contract    * Only contract owner can fetch this data and make easy for developer to check the current contract configuration

fetchRegisteredFlightInfoByCode(bytes32).details: Fetch information for specific regisered flight

fund().details: Initial funding for the insurance. Unless there are too many delayed flights     resulting in insurance payouts, the contract should be self-sustaining

isOperational().return: A bool that is the current operating status

paymentWithdraw(address,bytes32).details: Transfers eligible payout funds to insuree

registerAirline(address,address,string,b.details: Add an airline to the registration queue     Can only be called from FlightSuretyApp contract

registerFlight(bytes32,uint256,address,b.details: Update the airline fund fields     Can only be called from FlightSuretyApp contract

setOperatingStatus(bool).details: Sets contract operations on/off    * When operational mode is disabled, all write transactions except for this one will fail

updateFundFieldAirline(address).details: Update the airline fund fields     Can only be called from FlightSuretyApp contract

voteToRegisterAirline(address,address).details: Vote to register a new airline in multiparty consensus     Can only be called from FlightSuretyApp contract
